member.name: M:ZintomShellHelper.MenuManager.CreateMenu(System.String[],System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates an option menu in text form. Returns the selected option.
member.returns: Selected item. If 'Escape' pressed will return -1.

member.name: M:ZintomShellHelper.MenuManager.CreateBackMenu(System.Int32)
member.summary: Helper method to create a back menu.

member.name: M:ZintomShellHelper.MenuManager.Reset
member.summary: For when you want the user to be able to enter text again.
